name: Chain Mail Generator
description:
Chain Mail Generator

A Nigerian prince, a "super CEO" or Bill Gates himself... As a chain mail writer you daily fake your identity in different ways as you try to relieve your evergrowing email list recipients of their money.

To your help, you have:

  • the Dark Web Marketplace to get hold of more email addresses,
  • a Scam Tracker to keep track of the spread of your emails,
  • a Bank Account to which the scammed can send their money and
  • the titular Chain Mail Generator.

Different emails have different potential for spread and earning you money depending on their contents. Funny messages are spread more easily but they need to be serious to incentivize payment.

Do not worry too much about that though. Lacking quality of your emails can easily be made up for by the sheer quantity of emails that you can produce with your generator.

Made with HTML, CSS and Javascript during Global Game Jam 2018, on the LiU Game Jam site, based on the theme Transmission.
